channel.title: Frederik Beck on ICCC Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Frederik Beck on ICCC Blog

item.title: Beispiel Blog: So erstellst du einen Blogpost
item.description: Ein Tutorial-Beitrag, wie man einen Blogpost erstellt, Bilder, Galerien, Zitate, Überschriften und Code einfügt.

item.title: Which Bike Should You Choose as a Beginner?
item.description: A beginner’s guide to choosing the right bike, covering frame materials, sizes, types, and budget considerations.

item.title: Endurance Training Methods, Recovery and Nutrition
item.description: A comprehensive guide to endurance training, recovery, strength work, and nutrition for cyclists and triathletes.

item.title: Essential Road Cycling Clothing and Where to Buy
item.description: A beginner-friendly guide to essential road cycling clothing, safety gear, and where to purchase them.

item.title: Is Bike Fitting Really That Precise?
item.description: Bike fitting myths and practical advice for beginners — how to adjust your saddle, handlebars, and cleats safely.

item.title: Bike Washing, Maintenance & Care
item.description: Practical tips for cleaning, maintaining, and caring for your bike, including chain lubrication and basic repairs.

item.title: New Website and a Vision for the ICCC
item.description: An overview of the new ICCC website and vision to make cycling more accessible. Covers communication, club facilities, indoor training, partnerships, and safety to grow membership and strengthen club culture.

item.title: Quick Guide: Creating Logos & Graphics for the ICCC
item.description: A practical guide to creating and using ICCC logos and graphics with free tools like Photopea and Inkscape.

item.title: Website Maintenance Guide
item.description: A practical guide to maintaining and updating the ICCC website, including tips for content, images, galleries, tools, and workflow.

item.title: Permakultur: Nachhaltig Gärtnern für die Zukunft
item.description: Ein ausführlicher Einblick in die Prinzipien der Permakultur und wie man sie im eigenen Garten umsetzen kann.
